Question
========

A person achieves a score of 14.3 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 13.2 with a standard deviation 1.6. The z-score of the person with 14.3 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.76
* -0.19
* 0.69

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.76: Incorrect
-0.19: Incorrect
* 0.69: Correct
